name: Tressym (monstrosity)
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 40 ft.

trait.name: Detect Invisibility
text: Within 60 feet of the Tressym (monstrosity), magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the Tressym (monstrosity)'s sight

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The Tressym (monstrosity) has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Poison Sense
text: The Tressym (monstrosity) can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

trait.name: Familiar
text: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a Tressym (monstrosity) in stead of a normal cat.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

description: Source: Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus p. 241, Infernal Machine Rebuild
